articles.description: West Indies successfully chase 219 against England for their first win of the five-match T20 series.

articles.description: England's errors are undermining a team of ambition and promise and show little sign of shifting in a desperately disappointing autumn
articles.title: England 20-29 South Africa: Groundhog-day defeats keep stacking up

articles.description: Hungary's assistant coach Adam Szalai is in a "stable" condition in hospital after he collapsed during the Nations League away match with the Netherlands in Amsterdam.

articles.description: France fight back to edge out New Zealand, inflicting their first defeat of the Autumn Nations Series campaign.

articles.description: Arsenal forward Kai Havertz is among the goalscorers as Germany thrash Bosnia-Herzegovina to claim a record Nations League victory and win Group A3 with a game to spare.
articles.title: Germany 7-0 Bosnia-Herzegovina: Kai Havertz among scorers in record Nations League win

articles.description: Mexican Gilberto Ramirez defeats Briton Chris Billam-Smith in Saudi Arabia to become the unified WBA and WBO cruiserweight champion.
articles.title: Gilberto Ramirez v Chris Billam-Smith: Mexican unifies titles with points win

articles.description: Wales boss Craig Bellamy says justice was served as Turkey missed a controversial late penalty in their goalless Nations League draw.
articles.title: Turkey 0-0 Wales: Penalty miss was justice served - Bellamy

articles.description: Katie Taylor and Amanda Serrano produce another classic before a reported 120 million watch the farcical Mike Tyson v Jake Paul event.
articles.title: Tyson vs Paul: Katie Taylor & Amanda Serrano save farcical main event

articles.description: If this is Chelsea in a new era under Sonia Bompastor, it seems they are heading in the same direction as their previous one - towards more success.
